item.title: 14.3.2 Bash Sample Client
item.description: 14.3.2 Bash sample client (old style) Step 1. Prepare oci-curl function The method below uses the oci-curl bash function previously provided in the OCI documentation. It is reserved for backup, and as of 2022, it has been changed to use oci cli like oci raw-request. See the link below for the latest information. https://docs.cloud.oracle.com/iaas/Content/API/Concepts/signingrequests.htm#Bash # Version: 1.0.2 # Usage: # oci-curl <host> <method> [file-to-send-as-body] <request-target> [extra-curl-args] # ex: # oci-curl iaas.
